DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine CX157 effective safe patient treatment treatment resistant depression six week treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy , Safety Tolerability CX157 Treatment Resistant Depression
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study examine efficacy CX157 Modified Release Tablet , 125 mg administer twice per day ( BID ) compare placebo subject Treatment Resistant Depression ( TRD ) . Secondary objective evaluate safety tolerability CX157 Modified Release Tablet , 125 mg BID TRD subject characterize steady-state pharmacokinetic profile explore pharmacodynamic relationship .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female , 20 65 year age 2 . Able read , understand converse English provide write , date informed consent 3 . Diagnosed Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) Treatment Resistant Depression ( TRD ) 4 . Females acceptable method contraception 1 . Major depressive episode great five year 2 . A history Substance Use Disorder exception nicotine dependence past 12 month 3 . ObsessiveCompulsive Disorder ( OCD ) , Panic Disorder , Posttraumatic Stress Disorder ( PTSD 4 . A history schizophrenia schizoaffective disorder 5 . A history anorexia nervosa , bulimia nervosa , eat disorder otherwise specify , within past five year 6 . A history Antisocial Personality Disorder Borderline Personality Disorder 7 . Recent suicidal behavior risk behavior course study 8 . Electroconvulsive therapy ( ECT ) within past five year 9 . Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation ( TMS ) treatment current episode depression 10 . Vagus Nerve Stimulation ( VNS ) time 11 . Any psychoactive drug within one four week prior randomization visit depend type drug 12 . Significant abnormality screen physical examination 13 . Significant cardiac abnormality uncontrolled hypertension , recent myocardial infarction , Congestive heart failure ( CHF ) , Angina pectoris 14 . A history within past two year significant head trauma , surgical procedure involve brain , degenerative central nervous system disorder ( e.g. , Alzheimer 's Parkinson 's Disease ) , epilepsy , mental retardation 15 . A history hypothyroidism stable dosage thyroid replacement medication less six month 16 . A history hyperthyroidism treat ( medically surgically ) less six month prior screen 17 . Participation investigational study past one month 18 . A positive screening urine test drug abuse 19 . Female subject pregnant lactating
